evaṃ me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā ukaṭhāyaṃ viharati subhaga
vane sālarājamūle tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhu āmantesi
bhikkhavo ti bhadante ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ bhagavā
etadavoca sabbadhammamūlapariyāyaṃ vo bhikkhave desissāmi taṃ su
ṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha bhāsissāmī ti evaṃ
bhante ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ bhagavā etadavo

idha bhikkhave asutavā puthujjano ariyānaṃ adassāvī ariya
dhammassa akovido ariyadhamme avinito sappurissānaṃ adassā
vī sappurisadhammassa akovido sappurisadhamme avinito
paviṃ pavito saññjānāti paviṃ pavito sañña
tvā paviṃ maññati paviyā maññati pavito maññati pavim meti maññati pavi abhinandati taṃ kassa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi āpaṃ āpato sañjānāti āpaṃ āpato saññatvā
āpaṃ maññati āpasmiṃ maññati āmato maññati āpa meti maññati āpaṃ ābhinandati taṃ kassa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi tejaṃ tejato sañjā
nāti tejaṃ tejato saññatvā tejaṃ maññati tejasmiṃ maññati tejato maññati tejaṃ meti maññati tejaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadā
mi vāyaṃ vāyato sañjānāti vāyaṃ vāyato saññatvā vāyaṃ u maññati vāyasmiṃ maññati vāyato maññati vāyaṃ meti maññati vāyaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ
tassā ti vadāmi

bhūte bhūtato sañjānāti bhūte bhūtato saññatvā bhūte maññati bhūtesu maññati bhūtato maññati bhūte meti maññati bhūte abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi de
ve devato sañjānāti deve devato saññatvā deve maññati devesu maññati devato maññati deve meti maññati deve abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi pajāpatiṃ pajāpatito
sañjānāti pajāpatiṃ pajāpatito saññatvā pajāpatiṃ maññati pajāpatasmiṃ maññati pajāpatito maññati pajāpatiṃ meti maññati pajāpatiṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ
tassā ti vadāmi brahmaṃ brahmato sañjānāti brahmaṃ to brahmato saññatvā brahmaṃ maññati brahmani maññati brahmato maññati brahmaṃ meti maññati brahmaṃ abhinandati taṃ kassa
hetuṃ apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ābhassare ābhassarato sañjānāti ābhassare ābhassarato saññatvā ābhassare maññati ābhassaresu mañña
ti ābhassarato maññati ābhassare meti maññati ābhassare abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassa ti vadāmi subhakiṇhe subhakiṇhato sañjānāti subhakiṇhe subhakiṇhato sa
ññatvā subhakiṇhe maññati subhakiṇhesu maññati subhakiṇhato maññati subhakiṇhe meti maññati subhakiṇhe abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi vehappale vehapphalato saññjā
nāti vehapphale vehapphalato saññatvā vehapphale maññati vehapphalesa maññati vehapphalato maññati vehapphale meti maññati vehapphale abhinandati taṃ kissa
hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi abhibhuṃ abhibhūto sañjānāti abhibhuṃ abhibhūto saññatvā abhibhū maññati abhibhusmiṃ maññati abhibhuto maññati abhibhuṃ
meti maññati abhibhuṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetuṃ apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi

ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākāsānañcāyatanato saññjānāti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ ākā
sānañcāyatanato saññatvā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ maññati ākāsānañcāyatanasmiṃ maññati ākāsānañcāyatanato maññati ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ meti maññati ākāsānañcā
yatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi viññāṇaññcāyatanaṃ viññāṇaññcāyatanato sañjānāti viññāṇaññcāyatanaṃ viññāṇaññcāyatanato sa
ññatvā viññāṇaññcāyatanaṃ maññati viññāṇaññcāyatanasmiṃ maññati viññāṇaññcāyatanato maññati viññāṇaññcāyatanaṃ meti maññati viññāṇa
ñcāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanato sañjānāti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ āki
ñcaññāyatanato saññatvā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ maññati ākiñcaññāyatanasmiṃ maññati ākiñcaññāyatanato maññati ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ meti maññati ākiñcaññāya
tanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññāyatanato sañjānāti nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato saññatvā
nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ maññati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasmiṃ maññati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanato maññati nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ meti maññati nevasa
ññānāsaññāyatanaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññāta tassā ti vadāmi

diṭhaṃ diṭhato saññjānāti diṭhaṃ diṭhato saññatvā diṭhaṃ maññati diṭhasmi maññati diṭhato maññati diṭhaṃ me
ta maññati diṭhaṃ abhanandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sutaṃ sutato sañjānāti sutaṃ sutato saññatvā sutaṃ maññati sutasmiṃ maññati sutato
maññati sutaṃ meti maññati sutaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi muta mutato sañjānāti mutaṃ mutato saññatvā mutaṃ maññati mutasmiṃ maññati muta
to maññati mutaṃ meti maññati mutaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi viññātaṃ viññātato sañjānāti viññātaṃ viññātato saññatvā viññātaṃ
maññati viññātasmiṃ maññati viññātato maññati viññātaṃ meti maññati viññātaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi

ekattaṃ ekattato sañjānāti ekattaṃ ekattato sañña
tvā ekattaṃ nānatta maññati ekattasmiṃ maññati ekattato maññati ekattaṃ meti maññati ekattaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nānattaṃ nānattato sañjānāti
nānattaṃ nānattato saññatvā nānattaṃ maññati nānattasmiṃ maññati nānattato maññati nānattaṃ meti maññati nānattaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sabba sabbaṃ
to sañjānāti sabbaṃ sabbaṃto saññatvā sabbaṃ maññati sabbasmiṃ maññati sabbato maññati sabba meti maññati sabbaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi nibbānaṃ nibbā
nato sañjānāti nibbānaṃ maññati nibbānato saññatvā nibbānaṃ maññati nibbānaṃsmiṃ maññati nibbānato maññati nibbānaṃ meti maññati nibbānaṃ abhinandati taṃ kissa hetu apariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi puthu
jjanavasena paṭhamanayabhūmiparicchedo

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu sekkho appattamānaso anuttaraṃ yogakkhemaṃ pattayamāno viharati sopi paviṃ pavito abhijānāti
paviṃ pavito abhiññāya pathaviṃ mā maññi paviyā mā maññi pavito mā maññi pavim meti mā maññi pavi māabhinandi taṃ kissa hetu pa
riññeyyaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpati brahmaṃ ābhassare subhaṇṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññā
ññātañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānana
to abhiññāya nibbānaṃ mā maññi nibbānasmiṃ mā maññi nibbānato mā maññi nibbānaṃ meti mā maññi nibbāna māabhinandi taṃ kissa hetu pariññeyyhaṃ tassā ti vadāmi sekhava
sena dutiyanayabhūmiparicchedo

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arāarahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parakkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññā vimutto
sopi paviṃ pavito abhijānāti paviṃ pavito abhiññāya paviṃ na maññati paviṃyā na maññati pavito na maññati pavim meti na maññati paviṃ nābhina
ndati taṃ kissa hetuṃ pariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ teja vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhiuṃ ākāsānañcāyata
naṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbāna
to abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmiṃ na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetuṃ pariññātaṃ tassā ti vadāmi khīṇāsavava
sena tatiyanayabhūmiparicchedo

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhībhavasayojano sammañño vimutto
sopi paviṃ pavito abhijānāti paviṃ pavito abhiññāya paviṃ na maññati paviyā na maññati pavito na maññati pavim meti na maññati paviṃ
nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khāyā rāgassa vītarāgattā ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāya bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ
ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiññcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭhaṃ sataṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānā
ti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmiṃ na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā rāgassa vītarāgattā
khīṇāsavavasena catutthanayabhūmiparicchedo

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusatavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadatto parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyo
jano sammadaññā vimutto sopi paviṃ pavito abhijānāti paviṃ pavito abhiññāya paviṃ na maññati paviyā na maññati pavito na maññati pavim meti na maññati pa
viṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā dosassa vītadosattā ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcā
yatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbāna
to abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmiṃ na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā dosassa vītadosattā khīṇāsavavasena pha
ñcamanayabhūmiparicchedo

yopi so bhikkhave bhikkhu arahaṃ khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhā anuppattasadatto parikkhīṇabhavasaṃyojano sammadaññā vimutto
sopi paviṃ pavito abhijānāti paviṃ pavito abhiññāya paviṃ na maññati paviyā na maññati pavito na maññati pavim meti na maññati pavi nā
bhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā mohassa vītamohattā ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ abhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānaññcā
yatanaṃ viññāṇaññcāyatanaṃ akañcāññāyataṃnaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbāna
to abhiññāya nibbānaṃ naña maññati nibbānasmiṃ na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu khayā pamohassa vītamohattā khīṇā
savavasena yabhūmiparicchedo

tathāgatopi bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsambuddho paviṃ pavito abhijānāti paviṃ pavito abhiññāya paviṃ na maññati paviyā na maññati pavi
to na maññati pavim meti na maññati paviṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariññātantaṃ tathāgatassā ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ
brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ vi
ññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmiṃ na maññati nibbānato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na mañña
ti nibbānaṃ nābhinandati taṃ kissa hetu pariññātantaṃ tatāgatassā ti vadāmi satthuvasena sattamanayabhūmiparicchedo

tathāgatopi bhikkhave arahaṃ sammāsammāmbudo paviṃ pavito
abhijānāti paviṃ pavito abhiññāya paviṃ na maññati paviyā na maññati pavito na maññati pavim meti na maññati taṃ kissa hetu nandi dukkhassa mūlanti iti viditvā
bhavā jāti bhūtassa jarāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato sabbaso taṇhānaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho
ti vadāmi ...la... āpaṃ tejaṃ vāyaṃ bhūte deve pajāpatiṃ brahmaṃ ābhassare subhakiṇhe vehapphale abhibhuṃ ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ ne
vasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ diṭhaṃ sutaṃ mutaṃ viññātaṃ ekattaṃ nānattaṃ sabbaṃ nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhijānāti nibbānaṃ nibbānato abhiññāya nibbānaṃ na maññati nibbānasmiṃ na maññati nibbā
nato na maññati nibbānaṃ meti na maññati nibbānaṃ nābhimanandati taṃ kissa hetu nandi dukkhassa mūlanti iti viditvā bhavā jāti bhūtassa jarāmaraṇanti tasmā tiha bhikkhave tathāgato sabba
so taṇhānaṃ khayā virāgā nirodhā cāgā paṭinissaggā anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho ti vadāmi satthuvasena aṭhamanayabhūmiparicchedo idamavoca bhagavā na te bhikkhu
cāgavato bhāsitaṃ ābhinandanti mūlapariyāyasuttaṃ niṭhitaṃ paṭhamaṃ

evam me sutaṃ ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme
tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi bhikkhavo ti bhaddante ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassūsuṃ bhagavā etadavoca sabbāsavasaṃvarapariyāyaṃ vo kkha bhikkhave desissāmi taṃ
suṇātha sādhukaṃ manasi karotha bhāsissāmī ti evaṃ bhante ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṃ bhagavā etadavoca

yaṃ vadāmi no ajānato no apassato kiññca bhikkhave jānato kiṃ passato āsavānaṃ khayo hoti yoniso ca manasikāraṃ ayoniso ca manasikāraṃ a-
